description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Letters of Charles Dickens. Edited by his sister-in-law and his eldest daughter", "Letters. Collections" Author: Dickens, Charles Contributor: HOGARTH, Georgina. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012273.ff.3/12." Volume: 17 Page: 131 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1893 Publisher: Macmillan & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000931072 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
